content: Does wasmtime have a changelog somewhere? I checked the git repo for a CHANGELOG file, and also checked the releases page on Github, but couldn't see it.

Unfortunately it doesn't yet. We're working on improving our release process, including sensible handling of changelogs, but in the meantime generating a git log between versions is the best we can do, I'm afraid :confused:

Actually, it does :-) https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/blob/main/RELEASES.md

bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Standalone JIT-style runtime for WebAssembly, using Cranelift - bytecodealliance/wasmtime
oh, so it does — and I should really know better! :smile: Thank you for the correction, @Dan Gohman
